kpis.name: Total Sales
kpis.reason: This KPI is crucial to understand the overall revenue generated by the e-commerce business.

kpis.name: Average Order Value
kpis.reason: Average Order Value helps to understand the spending habits of customers and the profitability of each sale.

kpis.name: Sales by Channel
kpis.reason: This KPI helps to identify the most profitable channels and optimize marketing strategies.

charts.name: Sales Over Time
charts.description: This chart shows how sales have changed over time.

charts.name: Sales by Category
charts.description: This chart shows the total sales for each product category.

charts.name: Order Amount Distribution
charts.description: This chart shows the distribution of order amounts.

charts.name: Price vs Quantity
charts.description: This chart shows the correlation between product price and quantity sold.

charts.name: Sales by Channel
charts.description: This chart shows the percentage of total sales for each channel.
